subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Greg Maddux will be inducted Friday into the Atlanta Braves’ Hall of Fame, but his former teammates Tom Glavine and John Smoltz will not be on hand.
snippet: Greg Maddux will be inducted Friday into the Atlanta Braves’ Hall of Fame, but his former teammates Tom Glavine and John Smoltz will not be on hand.
